Title: Donald Trump Is Upset
Description: The candidate says we were unfair to him on trade.
Data: Being attacked by   Donald Trump is one of journalism’s more exhilarating experiences. We got the treatment on Thursday when he took to various TV shows and   Twitter  span TWTR    -3.31  %       with his usual soft sell and demanded corrections, apologies and resignations after our editorial reference to his trade policy. We haven’t had this much fun since   Eliot Spitzer left office.
